Message:
I always fail, and can
never get anything right
no matter what I do.

Sol’s so kind, and still cherishes
that birthday present I gave her
all those years ago...

But this year, I want to
give her a proper present.

Not something that’s misshapen,
but something really pretty.

A present that’ll make
Sol so happy, she’ll proudly
show it off to everyone.

The party’s tonight,
and I still haven’t
finished making it...

B-But, it’ll be okay.
I still have time.

Okay, um... I’ll start by
putting this part here, and...
